installer.title: {{productName}} Installer
installer.description: Install {{productName}} browser and start a privacy-focused, fast, and customizable browsing experience.
installer.adminRightsEnabled: Install for all users with admin rights.
installer.customPathRequired: Custom installation path requires admin rights.

exitConfirmation.title: Cancel Installation?
exitConfirmation.message: Canceling the installation process will prevent {{productName}} from being installed.

complete.launchCheckbox: 安装后启动 {{productName}} 浏览器

slide1.title: Welcome to {{productName}}
slide1.description: Welcome to the latest version of {{productName}}, a web browser developed with a focus on development and research in Japan. The content introduced next is only a part of the project.

slide2.title: Regular Updates
slide2.description: {{productName}} is maintained and updated continuously, even as a community-based project. We deliver safe browsing aligned with the principle that the web should be accessible freely to everyone.

slide3.title: Latest Features
slide3.description: The latest version of {{productName}} leverages cutting-edge web features developed by Mozilla's Firefox. It has also been redesigned to make tools everyone desires easily accessible.

slide4.title: Advanced Customization
slide4.description: Equipped with numerous customization options to maintain privacy better than your default browser. {{productName}} allows you to realize your preferred configuration.

slide5.title: Fighting for You
slide5.description: {{productName}} blocks harmful tracking. We balance website operation and user rights, working to improve the web both in functionality and privacy.

errors.signature_verification_failed: Installer signature verification failed. Execution aborted for security reasons.
errors.signature_verification_error: An error occurred during signature verification: {{0}}
errors.installer_execution: An error occurred while running the installer: {{0}}
errors.browser_not_found: {{productName}} browser not found. Installation was successful, but the browser executable could not be found.
errors.admin_rights_denied: Administrator rights were denied. You selected the administrator rights mode, but permission was denied.
errors.exit_code_not_found: Could not get the installer's exit code. Administrator rights may have been denied.
errors.powershell_process: 启动 PowerShell 进程失败： {{0}}
errors.admin_install_failed: Installation with administrator rights failed. Exit code: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_launch: Failed to launch installer process with user rights: {{0}}
errors.user_installer_execution: An issue occurred while running the installer with user rights: {{0}}
